amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit the application of the bill to court districts which have either only one sitting judge or that have multiple judges who can receive cases in any other way other than a random assignment basis.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restrict the application of the provisions of the bill to those court districts which either have only a single sitting judge or do not employ the practice of assigning cases on a random basis.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schroeder amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 248 (Roll no. 692).
